summary: A Japanese billionaire promised people on Twitter to giveaway money and has kicked Louis' royal place as the number 1 tweet...
body:
A Japanese billionaire promised people on Twitter to giveaway money and has kicked Louis’ royal place as the number 1 tweet without a picture that got the most retweeted.

Can we change that?

blog.description: Writing fiction | MASTERLIST |  My main blog is: @readerastronaut & Comments, likes and follows come from there ❤

title: Long Way Forward - Part 33
body:
I didn’t write the story this way to make it more interesting or dramatic. I brought this topic up because it’s important. I personally know several women who lost their children by miscarriage or stillbirth. It’s a terrible thing and it’s more common than people know. I’ll share some links of the sources I used. 

A BBC article about women who had a miscarriage

Learning about miscarriage 

Types of miscarriages

Word count: 1.3k

Lost and found

You felt numb like you were losing reality. Harry held your hand in the ambulance car. You tried not thinking about the worst. You arrived in the hospital and they immediately took you away. Harry stood there alone. He didn’t know who to call because others didn’t know about the pregnancy. He called Sara though. She arrived in a half an hour, just when the doctor came to Harry.

“Mr. Styles” he called out.

“Yes”

“Your wife is in a room now, resting. I am so sorry to tell you this but she had a miscarriage.” This was the thing Harry didn’t want to hear. Sara started crying and walked away.

“Do you want me to come back later to tell the whys?” the doctor asked Harry.

“No, please, tell me now,” he said.

“What you need to understand first, that this wasn’t her fault or your fault. There was no sign of an accident that would’ve caused it. You need to know that this happens often. She had never been pregnant before. It’s called anembryonic pregnancy. What it means is that the fertilized egg attached to the wall of her uterus, and while it may have begun to develop a placenta, it didn’t develop into an embryo.” he heard the words but it was hard to understand while holding back the tears.

“Can I see her?”

“Yes, of course. She’s up” Harry walked to the door and made himself open it. You laid there and looked at him as he came in. Tears automatically came out of your eyes. Harry cried too. He sat down on your bed and hugged you as you sat up to reach him. It was a couple of minutes until you parted.

“I love you” he breathed out.

“I love you too,” you said back.

That was one thing that you were sure of, that you’ll go through it together. You stayed in the hospital for a few days before going back home. You looked into the sitting room and you saw Harry removed the blanket.

“I threw it away” he looked down.

“Okay.”

“Do you want to rest now?”

“I’d like to cook, would you help me?”

“Yes.”

You two packed your stuff away that was in the hospital with you. Then you changed into more comfortable clothes just like Harry. You two started cooking and it was silent first, but then Harry accidentally dropped flour on you. It was all over on your face, on your apron, in the air. There was a moment of silence and Harry wanted to apologize, but you started laughing and threw some flour on him. It indicated a little fight and by the end, you were sitting on the floor with Harry in front of the oven watching the chicken being baked and talking.

“I don’t want to think about it all day,” you said. “I want to be happy again. I want to give my love to my child if I get pregnant again.”

“I can’t even imagine what you’re going through”

“The same as you, it was our baby. It was yours too”

“But it was in your body not mine”

“But I guess the pain is similar”

“It’s very… intense…yes”

“I’m here for you and you’re here for me.” you turned a bit to face him. You kissed him.

“You’re an incredible woman and I’m proud to be your husband.”

After you finished eating you were waiting for Harry to do the dishes. You were on the internet looking for something to distract you. It wasn’t always easy especially when you decided to tell your parents and Harry’s family too. It was hard for everyone. Or when you found the tiny baby shoes that you told about your pregnancy with. But Harry was there. It took two weeks to get back to work but it was good. It made you go out and interact with people. Your doctor recommended a support group and gave you some numbers. You decided to go to one of their meetings with Harry. It looked like in the movies, there were chairs around and someone managed the whole thing. It was a nice woman called Abby. She was happy that you came with your husband because it was mostly just the mothers who came to these meetings. There was another husband though. When it started Abby asked you if you want to share your story, because you’re the newest. It was a bit hard because it was Harry Styles we are talking about. You knew some of them recognized him and neither your pregnancy and your miscarriage was on the news.

“Hi, my name is y/n,” you said and they greeted you.

“I came with my husband and I know that these meetings are based on integrity, but I’d like to ask for some more privacy.” Some of them nodded. “I found out I was pregnant a month ago. First pregnancy, I was really excited because we wanted the baby. We were both so happy. I was five weeks pregnant then. Two weeks later I started bleeding at home and my stomach hurt really bad. I was taken into the hospital and the doctor said I had a miscarriage. We were both really broken because I never thought it could happen. I am so grateful for my husband because I know that it’s hard for him too. But thankfully we can talk about it when it’s time and we can do other things when we want. Uhm… Thank you!” you stood up and sat back to your chair. In the other one hour, you listened to others’ stories and you cried a lot. But it definitely helped both of you. Knowing that you’re not alone with this. Many women, many parents are going through it. Next week the doctor examined you and said that you are able to get pregnant again if you want to. When you got back home you talked about it with Harry. You agreed to try again when you feel like it. You were also back in the studio and both of yours albums were already recorded and waited to get published. You decided to release your albums on the same day in August. You were determined to be healthier. You started working out to be in a good shape. You mostly went to the gym with Harry. You stuffed the fridge and the kitchen with healthy food. You changed your lifestyle to be healthier for the baby and for yourself too. Harry was a total supporter.

Two weeks later you got a call from Sara.

“I have amazing news for you”

“What?”

“Simon Cowell wants to meet you personally”

“What?”

“Yes, you heard it. Well, it’s not known who will be the X-Factor judges this year so I have a wild guess and say that he wants you to be one”

“Oh my god!”

“I arranged a meeting for tomorrow”

“Thank you, Sara! Text me the address”

Next day you met him in the X-Factor offices, in his office to be precise. Maybe Sara was right.

“Mrs. Styles, it’s so nice to meet you again” he greeted you.

“You too, Mr. Cowell.”

“Simon, please”

“Then y/n, please”

I don’t know if you have any idea why I asked you to come here”

“Well, my manager had a wild idea that you want me to be an X-Factor judge” you chuckled.

“Well, she’s pretty damn clever then.” your eyes widened.

“You really want that?”

“Yes, I’d like to ask you and go through all the details before you say anything”

“Okay,” you said and he told you everything. It sounded all so exciting, but you didn’t want to make a decision without Harry. So you asked for a few days to think about it. As you got home and told all about it to Harry, he was excited too. So you decided to accept it and occupy yourself until the next baby Styles might arrive. Little did you know that one of your best friends will be a judge with you. The one and only Louis Tomlinson.

You knew some of them recognized him and neither your pregnancy and your miscarriage was on the news.

“Hi, my name is y/n,” you said and they greeted you.

“I came with my husband and I know that these meetings are based on integrity, but I’d like to ask for some more privacy.” Some of them nodded. “I found out I was pregnant a month ago. First pregnancy, I was really excited because we wanted the baby. We were both so happy. I was five weeks pregnant then. Two weeks later I started bleeding at home and my stomach hurt really bad. I was taken into the hospital and the doctor said I had a miscarriage. We were both really broken because I never thought it could happen. I am so grateful for my husband because I know that it’s hard for him too. But thankfully we can talk about it when it’s time and we can do other things when we want. Uhm… Thank you!” you stood up and sat back to your chair. In the other one hour, you listened to others’ stories and you cried a lot. But it definitely helped both of you. Knowing that you’re not alone with this. Many women, many parents are going through it. Next week the doctor examined you and said that you are able to get pregnant again if you want to. When you got back home you talked about it with Harry. You agreed to try again when you feel like it. You were also back in the studio and both of yours albums were already recorded and waited to get published. You decided to release your albums on the same day in August. You were determined to be healthier. You started working out to be in a good shape. You mostly went to the gym with Harry. You stuffed the fridge and the kitchen with healthy food. You changed your lifestyle to be healthier for the baby and for yourself too. Harry was a total supporter.

Two weeks later you got a call from Sara.

“I have amazing news for you”

“What?”

“Simon Cowell wants to meet you personally”

“What?”

“Yes, you heard it. Well, it’s not known who will be the X-Factor judges this year so I have a wild guess and say that he wants you to be one”

“Oh my god!”

“I arranged a meeting for tomorrow”

“Thank you, Sara! Text me the address”

Next day you met him in the X-Factor offices, in his office to be precise. Maybe Sara was right.

“Mrs. Styles, it’s so nice to meet you again” he greeted you.

“You too, Mr. Cowell.”

“Simon, please”

“Then y/n, please”

I don’t know if you have any idea why I asked you to come here”

“Well, my manager had a wild idea that you want me to be an X-Factor judge” you chuckled.

“Well, she’s pretty damn clever then.” your eyes widened.

“You really want that?”

“Yes, I’d like to ask you and go through all the details before you say anything”

“Okay,” you said and he told you everything. It sounded all so exciting, but you didn’t want to make a decision without Harry. So you asked for a few days to think about it. As you got home and told all about it to Harry, he was excited too. So you decided to accept it and occupy yourself until the next baby Styles might arrive. Little did you know that one of your best friends will be a judge with you. The one and only Louis Tomlinson.

summary: i live for you, i long for you, Olivia

summary: Omg imagine if h and yn’s sex tape or intimate photos of the couple got leaked :,( how do you think h would feel or react like...
question: Omg imagine if h and yn’s sex tape or intimate photos of the couple got leaked :,( how do you think h would feel or react like of course he’d be angry but I think he’d also be devastated and heartbroken because yn just shut down completely and is avoiding literally everyone including harry ugh I’m gonna kms
answer: he’d be so apologetic and try to pin the blame on himself because he let it happen and both him and his love are just very distraught and unexplainable that they still just try to comfort each other better than they would with themselves oh fuckie

hannah | vision isn’t 20/20, but harry is!!

+ requests are always open! +

masterlist

summary: What do you think Harry would do if his girlfriend felt off one morning and just progressively felt worse going through the day...
question: What do you think Harry would do if his girlfriend felt off one morning and just progressively felt worse going through the day until at 10 PM she finally has a fever, neck-ache, headache, backache, becoming very quiet and closed off mentally, is not focusing as hard, and has a hurting/upset stomach--but nobody believes she is this sick but Harry. Current situation. :(
answer: harry would really give his all within what he knows to try and aid and help his love, phone with him at all times in case he really needs backup and feels like he isn’t enough to try and make you feel better :(( lots and lots of support and love and god i just wanna give that to you at the moment, bubby. feel better xx

blog.name: pendantstyles
blog.title: you bring me home
blog.description:
hannah | vision isn’t 20/20, but harry is!!

+ requests are always open! +

masterlist

summary: concept: being mad at harry and he starts to talk to you when he's on stage as if there's not thousands of people right there bc...
question: concept: being mad at harry and he starts to talk to you when he's on stage as if there's not thousands of people right there bc you haven't talked to him all day and he misses you. that's it, that's what I think about instead of sleeping
answer:
harry would ask you if you’ve eaten already throughout the mic, voice softening and fans hushing each other as they take this to be pure content to be later talked and posted about just later.

would just babble in between to you until he gets the satisfaction to have you speaking and interacting back at him, coming to the point where he has to come to you personally and give you his water, possibly give to you every bouquet he’s receiced walking through b-stage, dedicating songs for you and even having your name sneak into them with a giddy smile on his face and —

i’ll be thinking about this until the day i die
